pull.title: make CheckDiskSpace() use 50 * 1024 * 1024 Bytes
pull.body: - remove 2 ugly spacess from a message string

events.body: I'm somewhat inclined to back this way offâ€” e.g. to 50 MiB or so, simply because of how badly it fails when it runs out and because 50MiB is pretty tiny compared to the blockchain.
Updated to check for 50 MiB and make that a const uint64.

events.message: make CheckDiskSpace() use a global static const uint64 for checking required disk space and remove 2 ugly spaces from a message string

events.body: Updated to use a global constant (defined in main.h).

comments.body: If you're going all the way to change it, please also make it a const instead of a magic value.
